## Public Member Functions

### getAnalysisUsage() {#a9c20c030f23f043969372d085e3dcff1}

<MemberDefinition
  prototype={<>void anonymous&#95;namespace&#123;MachineFunctionPrinterPass.cpp&#125;::MachineFunctionPrinterPass::getAnalysisUsage (<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/analysisusage">AnalysisUsage</a> &amp; AU) const</>}
  labels = {["inline", "virtual"]}>
getAnalysisUsage - Subclasses that override getAnalysisUsage must call this.

For MachineFunctionPasses, calling AU.preservesCFG() indicates that the pass does not modify the MachineBasicBlock CFG.

Definition at line <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/codegen/machinefunctionprinterpass-cpp/#l00040">40</a> of file <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/codegen/machinefunctionprinterpass-cpp">MachineFunctionPrinterPass.cpp</a>.

### getPassName() {#aa71a16542cbd1686e524f14d5ae7843b}

<MemberDefinition
  prototype={<>StringRef anonymous&#95;namespace&#123;MachineFunctionPrinterPass.cpp&#125;::MachineFunctionPrinterPass::getPassName () const</>}
  labels = {["inline", "virtual"]}>
getPassName - Return a nice clean name for a pass.

This usually implemented in terms of the name that is registered by one of the Registration templates, but can be overloaded directly.

Definition at line <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/codegen/machinefunctionprinterpass-cpp/#l00038">38</a> of file <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/codegen/machinefunctionprinterpass-cpp">MachineFunctionPrinterPass.cpp</a>.
